a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of people living in extreme poverty by region, 1820 to 2018
This data is calculated based on a ‘cost of basic needs’ approach. It represents the number of people unable
to meet basic needs (including minimal nutrition and adequately heated shelter) according to prices of
locally-available goods and services at the time.
